author: Barton Swaim
title: The Right Way to Defend Democracy
text:
Hand-wringing among progressives over the supposed rise of fascism in the U.S. was, to my mind, one of the least attractive responses to the election of Donald Trump. Some of this country’s most accomplished intellectuals drew risible comparisons between America in 2016 and central Europe in the 1930s; recall the many allusions to Sinclair Lewis’s satirical novel about American fascism, “It Can’t Happen Here.”
At least “Can It Happen Here? Authoritarianism in America” (Dey St., 481 pages, $17.99) frames the subject as a question...
